data.author: Bloomberg
data.title: Silver hits record high on supply tightness, Fed rate-cut hopes
data.description: Silver rises as much as 0.8% to trade at $58.9471 an ounce, above a previous peak of $58.84 set two days earlier
data.content:
Silver rose to a record, as traders laid speculative bets on continued supply tightness and lower borrowing costs in the US. Gold also gained.
